General.Name: Advanced Lithium Electrochemistry Cayman Co Ltd
General.Description: Advanced Lithium Electrochemistry (Cayman) Co., Ltd. engages in the research, manufacturing, and sales of materials for lithium iron phosphate Nano co-crystalline olivine materials (LFP-NCO) in China, Europe, other Asia countries, and internationally. The company provides Nanostructured olivine-based and Ni-based layer oxides cathode materials. It also manufactures and installs electricity generation, transmission, and distribution machinery; and manufactures and distributes batteries, cars, peripherals, and electronic components. Advanced Lithium Electrochemistry (Cayman) Co., Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 2-1, Guishan Industrial Park, Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 33068
